title: Are there any rappers who've come from 'well-to-do,' upper middle class families? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tyga. One of the fakest rappers out there. He raps like he's a thug and says things on his songs that he doesn't do. Anyways, I found my proof on an old TMZ vid on YouTube. He clearly raps that his mom owned a Range Rover and that he's actually from a bit of upper class background.
Yes for example you have Drake who never actually "started from the bottom"
